verses.verse: In the year <S%H8141><s%> that Tartan <S%H8661><s%> came <S%H935><s%> unto Ashdod <S%H795><s%>, (when Sargon <S%H5623><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> him,) and fought <S%H3898><s%> against Ashdod <S%H795><s%>, and took <S%H3920><s%> it;

At the same time <S%H6256><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Isaiah <S%H3470><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amoz <S%H531><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> and loose <S%H6605><s%> the sackcloth <S%H8242><s%> from off thy loins <S%H4975><s%>, and put off <S%H2502><s%> thy shoe <S%H5275><s%> from thy foot <S%H7272><s%>. And he did so <S%H6213><s%>, walking <S%H1980><s%> naked <S%H6174><s%> and barefoot <S%H3182><s%>. by: Heb. by the hand of

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Like as my servant <S%H5650><s%> Isaiah <S%H3470><s%> hath walked <S%H1980><s%> naked <S%H6174><s%> and barefoot <S%H3182><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> for a sign <S%H226><s%> and wonder <S%H4159><s%> upon Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and upon Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%>;

So shall the king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> lead away <S%H5090><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> prisoners <S%H7628><s%>, and the Ethiopians <S%H3568><s%> captives <S%H1546><s%>, young <S%H5288><s%> and old <S%H2205><s%>, naked <S%H6174><s%> and barefoot <S%H3182><s%>, even with their buttocks <S%H8357><s%> uncovered <S%H2834><s%>, to the shame <S%H6172><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>. the Egyptians: Heb. the captivity of Egypt shame: Heb. nakedness
And they shall be afraid <S%H2865><s%> and ashamed <S%H954><s%> of Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%> their expectation <S%H4007><s%>, and of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> their glory <S%H8597><s%>.

And the inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of this isle <S%H339><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%>, Behold, such <S%H3541><s%> is our expectation <S%H4007><s%>, whither we flee <S%H5127><s%> for help <S%H5833><s%> to be delivered <S%H5337><s%> from <S%H6440><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%>: and how shall we escape <S%H4422><s%>? isle: or, country
